verses.roman:
mahāprabhu āilā śuni' śiṣṭa śiṣṭa jana
brāhmaṇa, kṣatriya āsi' karena daraśana

synonyms: mahāprabhu āilā—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu has arrived; śuni'-hearing; śiṣṭa śiṣṭa jana—all respectable persons; brāhmaṇa—belonging to the brāhmaṇa community; kṣatriya—belonging to the kṣatriya community; āsi'-coming; karena daraśana—see.
translation: Hearing that Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu had come, all the respectable members of the brāhmaṇa and kṣatriya communities came to see Him.
